revision.text:
=Decorate Editor VB6 (Active)= Decorate Editor support will be at [http://doomguy0505.wiki-site.com/index.php/Decorate_Editor http://doomguy0505.wiki-host.com/index.php/Decorate_Editor]
It has been updated a lot recently and a new Service Pack is available. This is the primary site, I don't want to waste ZDoom's bandwith anymore.
=Decorate Editor Sharp= This is (or will be) the successor of the old Decorate Editor. As the name implies, it is written in C#. It is discontinued, sorry.
*The latest release is 1.0.3 *The latest stable release is 1.0.3
==Links== *Sourceforge Project [http://sourceforge.net/projects/deceditsharp/ http://sourceforge.net/projects/deceditsharp/] *Support Forums - [http://doomguy0505.free-site-host.com/phpBB2 http://doomguy0505.free-site-host.com/phpBB2] *SVN - [http://OpenSVN.csie.org/deceditsharp http://OpenSVN.csie.org/deceditsharp]
==Changelog== ===1.0.3 Stable=== *Decoration editor implemented *Replace with added *Small fixes ===1.0.2 Beta=== *Key editor implemented ===1.0.1 Beta=== *Full actor editor implemented ===1.0.0 Beta=== *Basic text editor functioning
=Dynamic Lights Editor Sharp= This is a GLDEFS editor based on Decorate Editor Sharp 1.0.3
*The latest release is 1.0.0 *The latest stable release is 1.0.0
==Links== *[http://hosted.filefront.com/Doomguy0505/1925885 DynEditSharp on FileFront.
[[Category:Editing tools]] [[Category:Tools]]
